text:
Kris Jenner Admits to Feeling Like Caitlyn’s "Scapegoat" Amidst Memoir Drama

Kris Jenner wants to set the record straight. In an all-new sneak peek from Sunday’s episode of Keeping Up With the Kardashians, Kim Kardashian and her mom have a discussion about…

http://ift.tt/2rgCcwO
